ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Active servers?
ygData.msgSnippet: I also play on fennin-ro and I can solo all my classes except for my enchanter.  I have the hardest time trying to solo this nerd.  I have no problems in
ygData.messageBody:
I also play on fennin-ro and I can solo all my classes except for my enchanter.  I have the hardest time trying to solo this nerd.  I have no problems in groups and can handle myself like a pro, solo ...I cannot, any hints or suggestions?
67th Cleric LifeSpere
66th Necromancer DeathTicket
65th Mage Levana
61st Druid LeafSkin
61st Enchanter MindMender
57th Pally Thigore

--- On Thu, 4/23/09, Kent King <propellerheadus@...> wrote:

From: Kent King <propellerheadus@...>
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Active servers?
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Date: Thursday, April 23, 2009, 7:23 AM

With the addition of Mercs anyone can solo now.  I understand that it is also much easier to level now than back in the day (hot zones etc).  I've had an account on Fenin Ro since 4/1/99.  I think the game has improved, but others would disagree.
 
Quwi Changkane, 80 Monk

--- On Wed, 4/22/09, juan rodarte <juan_rodarte2001@ yahoo.com> wrote:

From: juan rodarte <juan_rodarte2001@ yahoo.com>
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Active servers?
To: EverQuest@yahoogrou ps.com
Date: Wednesday, April 22, 2009, 6:44 PM

i am  currently on  Bristlebane  level 73 mage ,  if  anyone  is on  look me  up  name is  Revecca  i can help  with  what i  can
 


--- On Wed, 4/22/09, aroticod8 <Aroticod8@aol. com> wrote:

From: aroticod8 <Aroticod8@aol. com>
Subject: [EverQuest] Re: Active servers?
To: EverQuest@yahoogrou ps.com
Date: Wednesday, April 22, 2009, 9:12 AM

I was actively playing on the Bristlebane server in a guild, I think they merged some servers together now I dont know which ones. The latest expansion is Seeds of Destruction, i think it would be easy to start up again on bristlebane server if its anything like I remember.

--- In EverQuest@yahoogrou ps.com, "D. Scott Smith" <scott@...> wrote:
>
> How is Drinal working for you. I'm looking to restart EQ and I want to jump to whatever server is the most noob friendly ( is that an oxymoron? ) Honestly, I'm also looking at an EQ Private Server called Shards of Dalaya as an option and it looks so fun! ( and free too ) but not Sony sponsored. I miss EQ but I really don't want to get into the 65+ stuff, just really want to relive the good times =)
>
> Scott (Paria)
> Yeah, I know, I'm one of those old farts... whatever.
>
